ygData.subject: Re: EQ Money
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, You could easily make a killing in PAW in south Karana. Bandit and Dervish camps across Antonica are place for making great cash also. -Dyce
ygData.messageBody:
Hello,

You could easily make a killing in PAW in south Karana. Bandit and
Dervish camps across Antonica are place for making great cash also.
-Dyce

> -----Original Message-----
> From: McConnell, Jeff [SMTP:Jeff.McConnell@...]
> Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 8:26 AM
> To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
> Subject: [eqpaladin] EQ Money
>
> From: "McConnell, Jeff" <Jeff.McConnell@...>
>
>
> Hello All
> I am a 15th lvl High elf Paladin on Cazic-Thule, and I am located in
> the Faydwer area. My primary hunting grounds right now are the
> Aqua-Goblins
> (big group only) and Unrest. The problem I am facing is even though I have
> all the spells for 15th lvl and I have a majority of metal armor (some is
> still leather) I can't seem to make any real money. I have noticed a great
> need for a combine weapon but at my present rate it will take literally
> forever. I tend to hunt in groups of 3 or 4 and generally for around 5
> hours
> a day. I guess what I would like to know is, Am I doing something wrong?
> or
> is everyone broke at this lvl? Is there a better spot to hunt? Your
> assistance is most appreciated.
>
> Silvermyst
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
> http://www.onelist.com
> Deadline is June 19. See homepage for details.
